meta.label: GPT-3 NLP Tasks
meta.description: Use GPT-3 to complete natural language tasks

inputRoles.name: input_dataset
inputRoles.label: Input dataset
inputRoles.description: Optional dataset with text column to use

params.name: task
params.label: Task
params.description: Task to perform, e.g. Correct grammar mistakes.

params.name: output_mode
params.label: Output-only mode
params.description: Generate text output only without input

params.name: text_column
params.label: Input text column
params.description: Input text column based on which to generate

params.name: input_desc
params.label: Input description
params.description: Description of input column in singular, e.g. Original Text

params.name: output_desc
params.label: Output description
params.description: Description of output column in singular, e.g. Standard American English

params.name: examples
params.label: Fewshot examples
params.description: Input example ‚ü∂ Desired output (Remove the default and provide 1-10 examples, the more the better)

She didn't go to the market.

params.name: output_examples
params.label: Output examples
params.description: 1-10 examples of the kind of output to generate

params.name: temperature
params.label: Temperature
params.description: Temperature of the generation (The higher the more imaginative)

params.name: max_tokens
params.label: Max tokens
params.description: Maximum tokens to output per row (For English, 1 word ~ 1.37 tokens)

params.name: fail_on_error
params.label: Fail on error
params.description: Abort execution if any issues are raised. By default, errors will be logged per record in the output.
